title: Yours to Bare
features: "The most provocative romance of the year" and a Top 10 Amazon bestseller."Sensual, evocative, and spellbinding.”—K.L. Kreig,

I've never been able to give up on fate, no matter how cruel it's been in the past. So when it drops a stranger’s leather-bound journal at my feet, I know I should walk away...but I don’t.I pick her up, bend her spine, spread her pages. From the first word, I'm a goner. The owner didn't give me access to her most intimate desires, her private darkness, or her candid, sensual poetry—but it all goes down like warm milk. From that point forward, I’m the one consumed.

I went to his apartment and let him take my picture. Just once, to see how it would feel. I'm not his to look at, to inspire, to touch, but when he watches me through his lens, it’s a high I don't want to come down from...My journal is the one place I can be myself—as long as I can tie it up and put it away when I'm finished. But when Finn undoes the bow, he pulls strings that could unravel each of us.
description: "Addicting! Powerful! Beautifully sexual! I was absolutely SEDUCED from the very beginning! ...Hawkins delivers
the most provocative romance of the year
with YOURS TO BARE. If you think that you've seen her best, you have another thing coming with this release. It's PHENOMENAL. It's RAW. It's REAL. It's an EXPERIENCE."--
...And the poetry? No words. I am in serious awe of Ms. Hawkins talent and story weaving ability. 5 'Finn is mine' stars."
Hands down in my top 5 reads this year
. I loved every seductive minute of this page turner."-
-Kim Karr, New York Times Bestselling Author

"To say this book is addicting is an understatement. I was hooked from the first page to the last. This is so much more than a book. The characters, the plot ... it's all so real and raw. And the poetry--oh my God the poetry--is beautiful, provocative, and heart-wrenching.
Hands down, this is the best book I've read all year
Emily Goodwin, New York Times and USA Today Bestselling Author
"Provocative, thought-provoking, and breathtakingly honest, Yours to Bare is a sinfully sexy journey...Jessica Hawkins blew me away with this unique story, which has shot itself straight into my
. He is my new favourite obsession. #TeamFinnForLife" --
Lesley Jones, Bestselling Author of Carnage

Jessica Hawkins is a USA TODAY bestselling author known for her "emotionally gripping" and "off-the-charts hot" romance. Dubbed "queen of angst" by both peers and readers for her smart and provocative work, she's garnered a cult-like following of fans who love to be torn apart...and put back together. She writes romance both at home in the California desert and around the world, a coffee shop traveler who bounces from café to café with just a laptop, headphones, and coffee cup. She loves to keep in close touch with her readers, mostly via Facebook, Instagram, and her mailing list.
